name: Down Below - Demo
description:
Down Below is a First-Person shooter game that was developed in Unity. It is an experience that focuses on the Acquisition and Use of Upgrades/Powerups within video games.

The player must traverse through levels to find these upgrades in order to gear up to fight a boss stage! The player is forced to make choices when finding certain upgrades!

The game is still very much under development and this is just a playable demo.

If you decide to play this game, then I ask that you please fill out the accompanying survey to help with my research towards my final University dissertation (thesis).

The survey can be found here: https://forms.gle/EsgaCJu5GLdXqgzn8
